title: Miser's Purse, early 19th century
description: Pale red crocheted silk; cut steel beads form a symmetrical rectilinear repeating pattern.  Two steel rings control side closing; tassel of steel beads at one end.  Other tassel is missing.

tombstone.epitaph:
Miser's Purse, early 19th century.
early 19th century. Medium: silk, metal
Technique: crocheted. Gift of Mrs. Albert Blum. 1953-106-38.
